content: elevate your wardrobe with the market day cardigan crochet pattern designed for intermediate crocheters seeking a stylish and cozy project this oversized fit cardigan features a unique construction perfect for showcasing your crochet skills the pattern includes detailed written instructions graphics and right and left-handed video tutorials to guide you through each step with sizes available from xs to 5xl you can create a customized cardigan that fits perfectly crafted with red heart s all in one granny square yarn you can use your favorite worsted weight yarn and 6 square pattern for your own custom creation **unique features-** oversized fit for cozy comfort granny square construction for a unique look detailed photo and video tutorials for guidance range of sizes for a customized fit **materials needed-** hook 5mm us size 8 0 yarn red heart all in one granny square https //amzn to/3uhy1xk aran weight 2000-2900 yards
